Good day Mr Krists,
 I hope you are doing well. 
 I am writing to thank you for your opportunity to join our team. 

 As we had the previous meeting, I had no idea what Spring boot was or how it worked, but I was able to install it on my local machine and run it on my local machine. 
 I also didn't know about the in-memory database as the H2, but I was able to get it to work. As I usually use the MySql or MangoDB, or just use a Global variable to store any volatile data. 
 This was a project that really took me out of my confort zone and experiment with a new Framework. It was not very fun, to be honest, but very rewarding in a personal developping way. 
 Have a great day, 
 MohamedAli Zarraa
